players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana was killed, any info on who you investigated?"
Bob: "I'm the mafioso, be cautious. Charlie is the detective."
Charlie: "Investigated Bob, found him to be the mafioso. Be vigilant."
Bob: "I'm the mafioso, focus on villagers. Charlie knows me."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, watch out for villagers. Charlie as detective confirmed."
You: "Charlie as detective, Bob mafioso. Suggest voting Charlie to gather more info."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

You: "I'm the mafioso, focus on villagers. Charlie knows me."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, watch out for villagers. Charlie as detective confirmed."
Alice: "Charlie as detective, Bob mafioso. Suggest voting Charlie to gather more info."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
